content:
Here are a few color ideas for simple, relaxed cotton clothes for women for spring:

* Soft pastels: Pastel shades such as pale pink, baby blue, and mint green are classic spring colors that can add a touch of whimsy to any outfit.
* Bright and bold: Vibrant shades such as sunny yellow, coral, and hot pink can add a pop of color to an outfit and make a statement.
* Neutrals: Neutral shades such as beige, white, and grey can provide a clean and classic look and can be easily paired with other colors.
* Earth tones: Earth tones such as olive green, terracotta, and rust can add a natural and relaxed feel to an outfit.

Keep in mind that these are just a few examples, and you may want to consider offering a range of colors to appeal to a diverse customer base. It can also be helpful to pay attention to color trends and choose shades that are currently popular.
